Kiwity  is a village in Lidzbark County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland. It is the seat of the gmina (administrative district) called Gmina Kiwity. It lies approximately  east of Lidzbark Warmi≈Ñski and  north-east of the regional capital Olsztyn.
